missionSteps.title: Mission steps
missionSteps.tooltip: Displays the steps to be executed by the robot in the current mission.

id.name: Id
id.tooltip: ID of the step executed. Step IDs are numbered in order.

stepName.name: Step Name
stepName.tooltip: Name of the step executed by the robot.

missionQueue.title: Mission queue
missionQueue.tooltip: Displays the list of missions to be executed by the robot, including the current mission.

id.name: Id
id.tooltip: The ID of the order received.

order.name: Order
order.tooltip: The number of the order being executed. The number 0 relates to the current mission.

stepCount.name: Step Count
stepCount.tooltip: The number of steps in the order.
